channel.title: Posts on Mart's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Mart's blog

item.title: Duplicate Logging Azure Application Insights
item.description: Save troubles and money fixing duplicate logging in your Azure Application Insights, and Log Analytics Workspace.

item.title: Add project properties for consuming apps to a NuGet package
item.description: This article explains how to add consuming project properties to a NuGet package. Those project properties will be used in the consuming apps.

item.title: How to verify that ILogger actually logged an error?
item.description: Explains how to test LogError with Xunit.
